cards.rules_text:
Whenever you attack, create a 1/1 black Alien Army creature token, then amass Aliens X, where X it the number of attacking creatures.
Choose a background [i](You can have a Background as a second commander.)[/i]

Each Alien you control is a Soldier in addition to its other types. 
Each Vehicle creature you control is an Army in addition to its other types.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Of all who sail the Blind Eternities, no fleet is more feared than yours.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Each Alien you control is a Cyborg artifact in addition to its other types.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control that isn't modified. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]You have left behind the weakness of flesh.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Each Alien you control is a Zombie in addition to its other types.
Whenever a Zombie you control dies, you may return it to its owner's hand. If you don't, each opponent loses 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Death is just another of the many forces that have tried and failed to stop you.[/i]

cards.rules_text: [i]Lieutenant[/i] — At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control your commander, each opponent faces a villainous choice — You create a Treasure token, or your commander deals 3 damage to that player.

Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, create two Treasure tokens.

Create X 1/1 red Alien creature tokens with haste. Aliens you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.rules_text:

At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a token that's a copy of up to one target artifact or creature you control. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

Untap each creature you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Alien creature token with haste. If you control six or more creature tokens, create a token that's a copy of this creature instead.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has “{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to any target.”

When this creature enters, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
As long as this creature is an artifact or is modified, you may play an additional land on each of your turns. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]

Each player mills two cards, then you exile all cards from all graveyards. Create a 1/1 red Alien creature token with haste for each creature card exiled this way. Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control for each noncreature, nonland card exiled this way. Create a Treasure token for each land card exiled this way.

Gain control of each creature target opponent controls. Untap those creatures. Until end of turn, each of those creatures gains haste, can't be sacrificed, and can't attack its owner.
After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

Menace
If one or more tokens would be created under your control, twice that many of those tokens are created instead. Each enters with two additional +1/+1 counters on it if this creature attacked this turn.

Greerax enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Modified creatures you control have “{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.” [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]
Until end of turn, lands you control become 1/1 Cyborg artifact creatures with vigilance, indestructible, deathtouch, and haste in addition to their other types.
